items.sentence: I told Tom that he shouldn\'t cross the road without looking both ways.
Tom didn\'t have as much trouble getting a loan as he thought he would.
I can\'t think of anything I\'d rather do than go on a picnic with you.
Aunt Mary is my mother\'s sister and Aunt Alice is my father\'s sister.
It\'s hard to believe Tom wasn\'t aware that Mary was in love with him.
I used to visit my grandparents several times a month when I was a kid.
Tom took one look at the teacher\'s face and he knew he was in trouble.
Tom usually wears a cowboy hat, but today he\'s wearing a baseball cap.
If you don\'t do this now, you\'ll regret it for the rest of your life.
Tom was able to buy the same computer I bought much cheaper than I was.
